title: If I joined Imam in Ruku, is the rakat valid? Joined in standing position, no time for Fatiha, valid
transcript: shahab from bangladesh he joined the imam while the imam is in record if you joined the imam in record and both of you were in record for a second your record is is valid whether you said subhanallah be radhim or not in standing position you joined the imam while you're reciting alhamdulillah he went for rukur you don't have time to recite the fatiha for sure then you go for the core and raka is valid
